Reminder to All Lincoln Water/Wastewater System Users $313.57 10 inch $218.06 8 inch $136.28 6 inch $68.20 4 inch $40.89 3 inch $21.77 2 inch $13.59 1 ½ inch $6.86 1 inch $3.85 3/4 inch $1.98 5/8 inch 2014 Monthly Service Charge Water Meter Size The size of water meter determines what the service charge will be. Like the Water System, the Wastewater System must charge for services like accounting, sewer maintenance, etc. Wastewater Service Charge Wastewater fees for non-residential users are determined by each month's water use. In addition, some industries pay a surcharge for high-strength waste (Refer to 17.60.050) . This fee remains the same even in the summer months when water use normally increases. For example, if
